title: [Large-scale] AI Chatbot Utilization Educational Design Strategy: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Digital Literacy and Understanding of Instructional Design Terminology
context.additional_context: Modular content optimized for smartphone-based learning, with small-group breakouts to enhance real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain three or more educational use cases for AI chatbots
Learners can write evaluation reports assessing the feasibility of integrating AI chatbots by analyzing survey data
Learners can design one or more formative assessment tools utilizing AI chatbots that are executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
